thread.section_title: ECarpetGallery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ECarpetGallery | www.ecarpetgallery.com
thread.title: Beth Skowvron

author: Beth Skowvron
title: Beth Skowvron
text: In my search for a somewhat small, odd-sized rug for my kitchen, I discovered ECarpetGallery. I found what looked like the perfect rug - size, color, design, price - so I ordered using PayPayl and a 20%-off coupon code. My order was placed on a Saturday and the rug (shipping was FREE!) appeared in 5 working days, securely wrapped. It's beautiful!! Good quality, lovely colors that are more vibrant that the online photos, very fair price - not the usual fare seen at big box stores & chain carpeting stores! Thank you so much for providing a quality, unique, quickly shipped rug! I would not hesitate to order or recommend ECarpetGallery. (I didn't need to contact Customer Service so I cannot speak to that department.)
